name: Lost Alien (TyrantsWrath)
description:
PLAY ONLY IN FULLSCREEN!

Story: 

You are an alien who crash landed on earth, though you have been to Earth before, you have never been outside your space craft. Now that you have had to interact with Earth's atmosphere, your equipment  are malfunctioning. Your shield which was supposed to protect you from incoming projectile, and to let outgoing projectiles pass, is now allowing incoming projectiles, but blocking outgoing projectiles. 

How To play: 

W-A-S-D to move around. LMB(Left mouse button) to shoot.  Press 'E' when you are near a chest to open it.

Use your cursor to point and shoot. 

Press `Q` to Switch weapon. 

Press `Escape` to open, and close pause menu. 

MOST IMPORTANTLY: HAVE FUN, and I would LOVE to receive feedback from you.

Note: I was originally planning on adding dialogue, and collectable items so that at the end you would go and repair your space craft. But since my time frame for the project was only one month I decide to make a fun shooting game, an explain the story in the details here.
